text: Fabio Cudicini (20 October 1935 - 8 January 2025) was an Italian football player. ==Death== Cudicini died in Rome, Italy on 8 January 2025, at the age of 89. ==Club career statistics== |- |1955/56||rowspan="3"|Udinese||Serie B||2||0 |- |1956/57||rowspan="2"|Serie A||13||0 |- |1957/58||15||0 |- |1958/59||rowspan="8"|Roma||rowspan="8"|Serie A||2||0 |- |1959/60||4||0 |- |1960/61||26||0 |- |1961/62||30||0 |- |1962/63||28||0 |- |1963/64||23||0 |- |1964/65||23||0 |- |1965/66||29||0 |- |1966/67||Brescia||Serie A||18||0 |- |1967/68||rowspan="6"|Milan||rowspan="6"|Serie A||18||0 |- |1968/69||29||0 |- |1969/70||27||0 |- |1970/71||23||0 |- |1971/72||30||0 |- |1972/73||0||0 340||0 340||0 ==References== ==Other websites== * A.C.
